agreementText: By continuing, you agree to our {terms} and {privacy}
messageLimits: Sign in below to increase your message limits
errorOccurred: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
networkError: Network error. Please check your internet connection and try again.
corsError: Cross-origin error. This might be due to incorrect domain configuration.
popupError: Popup was blocked. Please allow popups for this site and try again.
configError: Authentication configuration error. Please contact support.
askAnything: What would you like to know or create today?
welcomeOnboardingDesc: Zulu Chat is an AI assistant that can help you with various tasks. Let me show you around.
modelSelectionDesc: Zulu Chat supports multiple AI models. You can select different models for different tasks.
accessibilityDesc: We've included high contrast mode, reduced motion, and other accessibility features to ensure everyone can use Zulu Chat.
languageSupportDesc: Change language anytime using the language picker in the top menu.
conversationMaster: You have become a Conversation Master
creativeStudioDescription: Create stunning images and videos with AI. Upload, edit, and transform your media into professional-quality content.
imagePromptPlaceholder: Describe the image you want to create in detail...
dragDropOrClick: Drag and drop image files or click to select
inpaintPromptPlaceholder: Describe what to replace in the selected area...
outpaintPromptPlaceholder: Describe how to extend the image...
variationPromptPlaceholder: Describe how to modify the image...
videoPromptPlaceholder: Describe the video you want to create in detail...
videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support video playback
videoGenerationTime: Video generation may take a few minutes
dropImagesToAdd: Drop images here to add to sequence
dragDropImages: Drag and drop images or click to add to sequence
addMultipleImages: Add multiple images to create video sequence
videoEnhancementPromptPlaceholder: Describe how to enhance the video (optional)...
audioPromptPlaceholder: Describe the audio track to generate...
tryDifferentFilters: Try different filters or search keywords
noPromptRecorded: No prompt recorded for this media
preserveFacialFeaturesTooltip: Maintains authentic facial features without idealization
createProjectDescription: Create a new project to organize your creative media.
advancedSettingsDescription: Fine-tune AI generation parameters for optimal results
guidanceScaleHelp: Controls how closely the model follows your prompt. Higher values follow prompt more strictly.
samplingMethodHelp: Different algorithms produce different qualities and styles of images.
samplingStepsHelp: More steps produce better quality but take longer to generate.
noiseLevelHelp: Adds creative randomness. Higher values produce more varied results.
seedHelp: Controls randomness. Same seed produces similar results for the same prompt.
enhanceDetailsHelp: Additional processing to improve details and sharpness.
hyperTilingHelp: Process image in tiles to achieve higher resolution details.
negativePromptPlaceholder: Things to avoid in the generation...
negativePromptHelp: Describe elements you want to avoid in the generated output.
advancedSettingsNote: These settings will apply to your next generation. Different models support different settings.
